ValidationRule.description: Loss Reason: Order Cancelled cannot be assigned by a User. This loss reason can only be set by the system admin.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ( $Profile.Name='Marketing User'), ($Profile.Name='Read Only'), ($Profile.Name='Solution Manager'), ($Profile.Name='Standard User'), ($Profile.Name='Xometry Sales User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Service User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Sales Leadership') ), ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c , 'Order Cancelled') )
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only system admin can set Loss Reason: Order Cancelled
